cause.description:
The U.S. Political system is so messed up and now it is time for some Truthiness and Justice for all.
Vote STEWART/COLBERT 08 or COLBERT/STEWART 08- I am sure that they both could go either way!
Purchase a t-shirt from Bustedtees.com and make it your new political campaign for 2008!
Forget Democrats, Republicans, Independents or Pot Smokers that think they can run the world's superpower!
Vote now, join this cause and prepare to be living a Lincolnish lifestyle!
visit: nofactzone.net www.colbertnation.com or www.comedycentral.com (search The Daily Show with Jon Stewart)
**"We report, you decide 08- STEWART/COLBERT OR COLBERT/STEWART 08"**
1. Truthiness for all
2. Justice for all
3. STEWART/COLBERT OR COLBERT/STEWART- We report, you decide 08!
cause.mission: Make Jon Stewart President of the United States and Stephen Colbert Vice President or vice versa!
cause.name: Stewart/Colbert 08
